name: Restaurant at the end of time
name_original: Restaurant at the end of time
description:
Welcome! As you find yourself at the end of time, your unwavering determination to run a successful restaurant leads you on an extraordinary journey. In order to continue serving delectable dishes, you embark on a thrilling time-traveling mission to procure the necessary ingredients from various eras.



In this unique game, you possess the ability to travel back in time to specific dates when it's convenient to harvest ingredients like wheat and milk. However, be cautious as certain ingredients, such as pumpkins for your signature pumpkin pie, may only grow in perilous or hard-to-reach locations. Exercise alertness and careful planning as you embark on quests to acquire these elusive ingredients.

Managing your restaurant's expenses and revenues is crucial for success. Some time-travel trips may incur costs, such as transportation or acquiring specialized tools for ingredient gathering. It is imperative to make wise financial decisions, ensuring that your revenues exceed your expenses and keep your restaurant thriving.

Throughout the game, you will encounter various challenges and puzzles that test your resourcefulness and decision-making skills. Your success in procuring rare ingredients and satisfying your customers' palates will unlock new recipes, expand your culinary repertoire, and attract a broader clientele.

However, be wary of individuals who harbor a dislike for time travelers. Their interference could disrupt your quests, necessitating quick thinking and diplomacy to overcome obstacles and safeguard your culinary ambitions.

Are you ready to embark on this epic time-traveling culinary adventure and become the ultimate master of flavors? The future of your restaurant awaits!
